title: Newcastle v Arsenal: Premier League – live
summary: Newcastle faces off against Mikel Arteta's title hopefuls in a highly anticipated match, looking to maintain their strong performance against the team. Rob Smyth will provide a minute-by-minute report on the game. Fans are eager to see if Newcastle can continue their winning streak.

title: Aston Villa 3-1 Fulham: Premier League – live reaction
summary: Aston Villa secured a crucial victory with goals from Ollie Watkins, John McGinn, and Emi Buendía. The team showcased resilience as they staged a comeback during the match. The win was a significant boost for Villa, as highlighted in the minute-by-minute report led by Daniel Harris.

title: Rachel Cooper obituary
summary: A prominent academic in design management in the UK has passed away. Known for their significant contributions to the field, they inspired many students and professionals. Their legacy is felt across the design community.

title: Starmer calls Reform’s policy on immigration ‘racist’ and says Farage’s party would ‘tear country apart’ – Labour conference live
summary: The Prime Minister criticized Reform's policy as immoral but acknowledged that those supporting it are not necessarily racist; rather, they are expressing frustration. He emphasized the need to understand these voters' concerns. The statement highlights the complexity of public sentiment towards political issues.

title: EU industry fears ever-expanding list of ‘derivative’ goods subject to steel tariffs
summary: Europe is concerned about potential damage to its markets if products containing metal, such as windows and doors, are included in a rolling list of items facing tariffs or trade restrictions. Industries fear increased costs and supply chain disruptions. This move could exacerbate economic challenges already facing the region.
